name: The Carrion Virus
text: You cannot ready Organic Webbing upgrades. When Revealed: Exhaust each of your Organic Webbing upgrades. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Kaine → remove this obligation from the game.

name: The Jackal's Obsession
text: “Through my perfected cloning techniques, I, THE JACKAL, will bring Gwen Stacy back to life.” -Miles Warren, the Jackal When Revealed: Place 1[per_hero] threat here. [crisis]

name: Jackal
text: Quickstrike. When Defeated: Confuse your identity. Search the encounter deck and set-aside area for the Clone Saga environment and put it into play. (Scarlet Spider's nemesis minion.)

name: Clone Saga
text:
Surge. Jackal gains surge.
The unique rule does not apply to characters in play.
Each [[clone ]]minion gains each [[trait ]]of the identity engaged with them.

name: Clone
text: Forced Interrupt: When a character other than your identity attacks Clone, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed cost is odd, resolve that attack against your identity instead.
